landing.description: Create your own branded site for videos, PDFs, and quizzes. Reach more students and sell with confidence — without relying on Telegram or WhatsApp.
landing.forWho: Built for teachers who already sell online and want a more professional, reliable setup.
landing.weWillContactYou: We’ll contact you on your phone number.
landing.limitedOnboarding: We’re onboarding a limited number of teachers.
